ure 10.16. An auto-encoder encodes the dataxn ∈RD to a code zn ∈RM code
and decodes it to a ˜xn similar to xn. The mapping from the data to the
code is called theencoder, and the mapping from the code back to the orig- encoder
inal data space is called thedecoder. If we consider linear mappings where decoder
